#Introduction {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

To the right is a visualization of all the computing courses in California. These courses are identified based on their content. 

```{r}

```


Column {data-width=650 .tabset .tabset-fade}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### CA Computing Courses

```{r}
courses <- read.csv("Courses.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

m <- leaflet(courses) %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  setView(lng = -119.016768, lat = 36.065230, zoom = 7) %>%
  addCircles(~lng, ~lat, popup = courses$schoolname, weight = 3, radius=40,
             color="#ffa500", stroke = TRUE, fillOpacity = 0.8) %>%
  addLegend("bottomright", colors = "#ffa500", 
            labels = "Intro to Computer Science",
            title = "CA Computing Courses")
m
```

### Data Explorer

```{r}
courses <- read.csv("Courses.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

datatable(
  courses, extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = 
      list('copy', 'print', list(
        extend = 'collection', 
        buttons = c('csv', 'excel', 'pdf'),
        text = 'Download'
      )
    )
  ))
```
